resources.string: "Button for authorization through Login with Amazon"
Welcome to Login with Amazon!\nIf this is your first time logging in, you will be asked to give permission for this application to access your profile data.
Logo to display when loading app
Do Not Disturb permission is REQUIRED in order for this app to alert you when your phone is in silent mode. Otherwise it will be unable to find your phone when it is on silent!
Ignore Battery Optimization permission is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED in order for this app to alert you when your phone is in silent mode. Otherwise there may be a significant delay in finding your phone!!
